abstract.text: An enumeration defining how neighboring tiles are automatically placed next to each other.

abstract.text: Add high-performance 2D content with smooth animations to your app, or create a game with a high-level set of 2D game-based tools.
An enumeration defining how neighboring tiles are automatically placed next to each other.
The adjacency requirement for this rule.
A name associated with the tile group rule.
The tile definitions used for this rule.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type that can be converted to and from an associated raw value.
A type that provides mathematical set operations.
A type that can be initialized using an array literal.
A thread-safe type whose values can be shared across arbitrary concurrent contexts without introducing a risk of data races.
A type that presents a mathematical set interface to a bit set.
